analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Abyākato appaccayo dhammo naabyākatassa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: abyākataḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na abyākatassa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato appaccayo dhammo nakusalassa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato appaccayo dhammo naakusalassa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato appaccayo dhammo naakusalassa naappaccayassa ca naabyākatassa naappaccayassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa na appaccayassa ca na abyākatassa na appaccayassa

original: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato appaccayo dhammo nakusalassa naappaccayassa
analyzed: ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ abyākataḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa na appaccayassa

original: ca naakusalassa naappaccayassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca na akusalassa na appaccayassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā upanissaye pañca. (Asaṅkhataṁ appaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe pañca adhipatiyā upanissaye pañca asaṅkhatam appaccaya sadisa
